statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, credit_card_number FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, masked_credit_card_number FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 100;
SELECT id, name, email FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT name, email, masked_credit_card_number FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, masked_credit_card_number FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY masked_credit_card_number ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, masked_credit_card_number FROM sensitive_data WHERE name <> 'John Doe' AND email LIKE '%@yahoo.com';
SELECT id, name, ssn FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT name, ssn, id FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, masked_name, masked_ssn FROM masked_data;
SELECT masked_ssn, id, masked_name FROM masked_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE ssn LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT id, name, ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, masked_name FROM masked_data WHERE id <= 10 GROUP BY masked_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, name, masked_ssn FROM sensitive_data JOIN masked_data ON sensitive_data.id = masked_data.id WHERE sensitive_data.id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, date_of_birth FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM Departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, salary_amount FROM Employees INNER JOIN Salaries ON Employees.employee_id = Salaries.employee_id WHERE salary_amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Salaries WHERE masked_salary LIKE '%XXX%'
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, date_of_birth FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, salary_amount FROM Employees JOIN Salaries ON Employees.employee_id = Salaries.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM Employees JOIN Departments ON Employees.employee_id = Departments.department_id;
SELECT DISTINCT department_name FROM Departments;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, ssn FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, ssn FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Salaries WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, address_line, city, state, zip_code FROM Employees JOIN Addresses ON Employees.employee_id = Addresses.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, ssn FROM Employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT employee_id, amount FROM Salaries WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_id, address_line, city, state, zip_code FROM Addresses WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT employee_id, department_name FROM Departments WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information_masking_policy;
SELECT user_name, role_id FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, mask_type FROM data_masking_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, encrypted_password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information_masking_policy WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_name, encrypted_password FROM users WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT user_name, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
